info.name: Nursery Bazar BD API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Nursery Bazar BD e-commerce platform with all endpoints, optional fields, and enums documented.

request.description: Register a new user. Role defaults to 'user' if not specified.

response.name: Sign Up
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Signup completed successfully. An OTP has been sent to your email address and will expire in 5 minutes",
    "data": {
        "name": "Admin",
        "phone": "01501234567",
        "email": "admin@yopmail.com",
        "role": "admin",
        "isEmailVerified": false,
        "status": "active",
        "isDeleted": false,
        "_id": "6971af2abcca1a5dcf215966",
        "createdAt": "2026-01-22T05:01:30.111Z",
        "updatedAt": "2026-01-22T05:01:30.111Z"
    }
}

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns access token.

response.name: email not verified

request.description: Admin only. Get all users with pagination and search.

query.description: Sort by price desc. Use 'price' for asc

request.description: All query params optional. Supports filtering, sorting, pagination.

formdata.value: Beautiful red rose plant for your garden

raw.description:
Required: shippingAddressId, selectedProductIds (array, min 1)
Optional: billingAddressId, paymentMethod, discountCode, notes
Note: Only selected products from cart will be ordered

request.description: Create order with selected products from cart. Unselected products remain in cart.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled

raw.description:
Required: street, city, postalCode, country
Optional: phoneNumber, isDefault (default false)

body.raw:
{
  "code": "SAVE20",
  "discountType": "percentage",
  "discountValue": 20,
  "validFrom": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "validUntil": "2026-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "maxUses": 100,
  "minOrderAmount": 500,
  "isActive": true,
  "description": "Save 20% on all orders above 500 BDT"
}

raw.description:
Required: code, discountType (enum: ['percentage', 'fixed']), discountValue, validFrom (ISO datetime), validUntil (ISO datetime)
Optional: maxUses, minOrderAmount, isActive (default true), description

request.description: Validate and calculate discount for a coupon code

formdata.value: Get up to 50% off on all plants

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Weekend Flash Sale",
  "description": "Limited time offer on selected items",
  "discount": 30,
  "startDate": "2026-01-25T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2026-01-26T23:59:59.000Z",
  "productIds": ["product_id_1", "product_id_2"],
  "isActive": true
}

raw.description:
Required: name, discount, startDate (ISO), endDate (ISO)
Optional: description, productIds (array), isActive (default true)

request.description: Get all active contact methods for users to contact admin

raw.description:
Required: label, contactType (enum: ['WhatsApp', 'Imo', 'Viber', 'Telegram', 'Phone', 'Email']), contactValue
Optional: isActive (default true), displayOrder (default 0)

request.description: Public endpoint - get all active payment methods

body.raw:
{
  "methodName": "bKash",
  "description": "Mobile payment via bKash",
  "accountNumber": "01712345678",
  "accountName": "Nursery Bazar BD",
  "instructions": "Send money to this number and submit transaction ID",
  "displayOrder": 1,
  "isActive": true
}

raw.description:
Required: methodName, accountNumber
Optional: description, accountName, instructions, displayOrder (default 0), isActive (default true)
All fields required. Submit after manual payment.

request.description: User submits transaction after completing manual payment
Admin verifies and updates transaction status. This also updates order payment status.
